definition: like or characteristic of or befitting a brother
details:
adjective
- like or characteristic of or befitting a brother
= synonyms: brotherly
- (of twins) derived from two separate fertilized ova
= example: (of twins) derived from two separate fertilized ova
= synonyms: biovular
- of or relating to a fraternity or society of usually men
= example: of or relating to a fraternity or society of usually men
